00024 int (orb::*orb::read_orb)(const char *)=&orb::read_orb_gauss;
00025 
00026 void orb::init_orbitals (string * basis, const int & N, const char * namefile ){
00027     NBasis = N;
00028     bs.resize(NBasis);
00029     psi = new double* [NBasis];
00030     psi[0] = new double [NBasis * NBasis];
00031     bs[0]=basis[0];
00032     evl.resize(NBasis);
00033     for ( int i = 1 ; i < NBasis ; i ++){
00034             bs[i] = basis[i];
00035             psi[i] = psi[i-1] + NBasis;
00036     }
00037     (this->*read_orb) ( namefile);
00038 }
00039 
00040 void orb::reorder_for_libint(){
00041     /*reorder the d orbitals to agree with libint */
00042     int count=0;
00043     while (count < NBasis ){
00044         if (bs[count] == "s") count +=1;
00045         else if (bs[count] == "x") count +=3;
00046         else if (bs[count] == "xx") { 
00047                 bs[count+1] = "xy";
00048                 bs[count+2] = "xz";
00049                 bs[count+3] = "yy";     
00050                 bs[count+4] = "yz";
00051                 bs[count+5] = "zz";
00052                 for (int j=0; j<NBasis; ++j){
00053                     double tyy = psi[j][count+1];
00054                     double tzz = psi[j][count+2];
00055                     double txy = psi[j][count+3];
00056                     double txz = psi[j][count+4];
00057                     double tyz = psi[j][count+5];
00058 
00059                     psi[j][count+1] = txy; 
00060                     psi[j][count+2] = txz;
00061                     psi[j][count+3] = tyy;
00062                     psi[j][count+4] = tyz; 
00063                     psi[j][count+5] = tzz;
00064                 }
00065                 count +=6;
00066         }
00067         else {
00068             cerr << bs[count] <<  " ERROR in reordering the orbitals" <<endl;
00069         }
00070     }
00071 }
00072 
00073 void orb::strip_orbitals (const vector < int>& a){
00074     int nrorbs = a.size();
00075     double** psinew = new double*[nrorbs];
00076     psinew[0] = new double [nrorbs*NBasis];
00077     for(int i=1; i<nrorbs; i++){
00078         psinew[i] = psinew[i-1]+NBasis;
00079     }
00080     for (int i=0; i<nrorbs; i++){
00081         evl[i] = evl[a[i]];
00082         for (int j=0; j<NBasis; j++){
00083             psinew[i][j] = psi[a[i]][j];
00084         }
00085     }
00086     delete [] psi[0];
00087     delete [] psi;
00088     psi = new double *[nrorbs];
00089     psi[0] = new double [nrorbs*NBasis];
00090     for(int i=1; i<nrorbs; i++){
00091         psi[i] = psi[i-1]+NBasis;
00092     }
00093     for(int i=0; i<nrorbs; i++){
00094         for (int j=0; j<NBasis; j++){
00095             psi[i][j]=psinew[i][j];
00096         }
00097     }
00098     #ifdef DEBUG
00099     cout << "nrorbs: " << nrorbs << endl;
00100     cout << "psi[0][i] :" << endl;
00101     for (int j=0; j<NBasis; j++){
00102         cout << psi[0][j] << endl;
00103     }
00104     #endif
00105 }

00107 void orb::init_orbitals_stripped(const orb& orb1, const int& nrorbs ){
00108     NBasis = orb1.NBasis;
00109     bs.resize(NBasis);
00110     evl.resize(nrorbs);
00111     if(nrorbs==0) {
00112         psi = NULL;
00113     }
00114     else {
00115         psi = new double* [nrorbs];
00116         psi[0] = new double [nrorbs*NBasis];
00117         bs[0]=orb1.bs[0];
00118     }
00119     for(int i=1; i<nrorbs; i++){
00120         psi[i] = psi[i-1]+NBasis;
00121     }
00122     for(int i = 0; i < nrorbs; i++){
00123         evl[i] = orb1.evl[i];
00124         for ( int j = 0 ; j < NBasis ; j ++){
00125             bs[i] = orb1.bs[i];
00126             psi[i][j] = orb1.psi[i][j];
00127             //cout << "(" << i << "," << j << "): " << psi[i][j] << endl;
00128         }
00129     }
00130 }

00140 void orb::rot_orb(const unsigned int & orb , const double rot[3][3] ){
00141         
00142         matrix r(rot[0], rot[1], rot[2]);
00143         vector <pair <int, int> >::iterator itat=_basis_on_atom.begin();
00144         for ( ; itat!= _basis_on_atom.end(); ++itat){
00145             int first_basis = itat->first;
00146             int last_basis = first_basis + itat->second;
00147             int i=first_basis;
00148             while (i < last_basis){
00149              rot_orb(orb, &i, r);
00150             }
00151         }
00152 }
00153 
00154 inline void orb::rot_orb(const double rot[3][3]){
00155         for (int i =0; i< NBasis;i++){
00156                 rot_orb( i, rot);
00157         }
00158 }

00160 void orb::rot_orb(const unsigned int & orb, int * i, const matrix &r){
00161     rot_orb(orb, i, psi[orb], r);
00162 }

00164 void orb::rot_orb(const unsigned int & orb , int *i, double * psi2, const matrix &r){
00165     //cout << "BS[" << *i << "] = " << bs[*i] << endl;
00166     //cout << "psi[orb][i] = psi[" << orb << "][" << *i <<  "]:" << psi[orb][*i] << endl;
00167     
00168     
00169             if ( bs[*i] == "s"){
00170                     (*i)++;
00171             }
00172             else if (bs[*i] == "x" ){
00173                     vec in (psi[orb][*i], psi[orb][*i+1],psi[orb][*i+2]) ;
00174                     vec out = r * in;
00175                     psi2[*i]=out.getX();
00176                     psi2[(*i)+1]=out.getY();
00177                     psi2[(*i)+2]=out.getZ();
00178 
00179                     /*double x_t,y_t,z_t;
00180                     psi2[*i] = psi[orb][*i]*rot.get(0,0) + psi[orb][*i+1] * rot.get(0,1) + psi[orb][*i+2] * rot.get(0,2);
00181                     psi2[*i+1]= psi[orb][*i]*rot.get(1,0) + psi[orb][*i+1] * rot.get(1,1) + psi[orb][*i+2] * rot.get(1,2);
00182                     psi2[*i+2]= psi[orb][*i]*rot.get(2,0) + psi[orb][*i+1] * rot.get(2,1) + psi[orb][*i+2] * rot.get(2,2) ;
00183                     */
00184                     (*i)+=3;
00185             }
00186             else if (bs[*i] =="xx" ){
00187                 // fix a fixed reference frame
00188                     string internal_order[6] = {"xx", "xy", "xz", "yy", "yz", "zz"};
00189                     // find what order the basis sets are  actually in
00190                     vector <int> external_order;
00191                     for (int j =0; j<6;j++){
00192                         for(int k=*i;k<*i+6;k++){
00193                             if ( bs[k] == internal_order[j]){
00194                                 external_order.push_back(k);
00195                                 break;
00196                             }
00197                         }
00198                     }
00199                     double Dorbs[9] =
00200                     { psi[orb][external_order[0]],psi[orb][external_order[1]],psi[orb][external_order[2]],
00201                     psi[orb][external_order[1]],psi[orb][external_order[3]],psi[orb][external_order[4]],
00202                     psi[orb][external_order[2]],psi[orb][external_order[4]],psi[orb][external_order[5]]};
00203                     matrix in(Dorbs);
00204 
00205                     matrix out;
00206                     matrix tr(r);
00207                     matrix t(r);
00208                     out = t * in  * tr.Transpose();
00209 
00210                     psi2[external_order[0]] = out[0][0];
00211                     psi2[external_order[1]] = out[0][1];
00212                     psi2[external_order[2]] = out[0][2];
00213                     psi2[external_order[3]] = out[1][1];
00214                     psi2[external_order[4]] = out[1][2];
00215                     psi2[external_order[5]] = out[2][2];/*
00216                     double xx_t, xy_t, xz_t, yy_t, yz_t, zz_t;
00217                     psi2[*i]= rot.get(0,0)*rot.get(0,0) * psi[orb][*i]   + rot.get(0,0)*rot.get(0,1) * psi[orb][*i+1] + rot.get(0,0)*rot.get(0,2)*psi[orb][*i+2]
00218                         + rot.get(0,1)*rot.get(0,0) * psi[orb][*i+1] + rot.get(0,1)*rot.get(0,1) * psi[orb][*i+3] + rot.get(0,1)*rot.get(0,2)*psi[orb][*i+4]
00219                         + rot.get(0,2)*rot.get(0,0) * psi[orb][*i+2] + rot.get(0,2)*rot.get(0,1) * psi[orb][*i+4] + rot.get(0,2)*rot.get(0,2)*psi[orb][*i+5]
00220                         ;
00221                     psi2[*i+1]= rot.get(0,0)*rot.get(1,0) * psi[orb][*i]   + rot.get(0,0)*rot.get(1,1) * psi[orb][*i+1] + rot.get(0,0)*rot.get(1,2)*psi[orb][*i+2]
00222                         + rot.get(0,1)*rot.get(1,0) * psi[orb][*i+1] + rot.get(0,1)*rot.get(1,1) * psi[orb][*i+3] + rot.get(0,1)*rot.get(1,2)*psi[orb][*i+4]
00223                         + rot.get(0,2)*rot.get(1,0) * psi[orb][*i+2] + rot.get(0,2)*rot.get(1,1) * psi[orb][*i+4] + rot.get(0,2)*rot.get(1,2)*psi[orb][*i+5]
00224                         ;
00225                     psi2[*i+2]= rot.get(0,0)*rot.get(2,0) * psi[orb][*i]   + rot.get(0,0)*rot.get(2,1) * psi[orb][*i+1] + rot.get(0,0)*rot.get(2,2)*psi[orb][*i+2]
00226                         + rot.get(0,1)*rot.get(2,0) * psi[orb][*i+1] + rot.get(0,1)*rot.get(2,1) * psi[orb][*i+3] + rot.get(0,1)*rot.get(2,2)*psi[orb][*i+4]
00227                         + rot.get(0,2)*rot.get(2,0) * psi[orb][*i+2] + rot.get(0,2)*rot.get(2,1) * psi[orb][*i+4] + rot.get(0,2)*rot.get(2,2)*psi[orb][*i+5]
00228                         ;
00229                     psi2[*i+3]= rot.get(1,0)*rot.get(1,0) * psi[orb][*i]   + rot.get(1,0)*rot.get(1,1) * psi[orb][*i+1] + rot.get(1,0)*rot.get(1,2)*psi[orb][*i+2]
00230                         + rot.get(1,1)*rot.get(1,0) * psi[orb][*i+1] + rot.get(1,1)*rot.get(1,1) * psi[orb][*i+3] + rot.get(1,1)*rot.get(1,2)*psi[orb][*i+4]

00251 void orb::rotate_someatoms(vector<int> atoms , matrix * M, 
00252         double * psi2 , const int & _orb){
00253         //cout << "orb = " << _orb << endl;
00254         vector <int>::iterator it;
00255         for (it = atoms.begin() ; it != atoms.end(); ++it){
00256             int first_basis = (_basis_on_atom[*it]).first;
00257             int last_basis = first_basis + (_basis_on_atom[*it]).second;
00258             int i=first_basis;
00259             while (i < last_basis){
00260                 rot_orb(_orb, &i, psi2, *M); 
00261             }
00262         }
00263 }

00279 
00280 int orb::read_orb_gauss( const char * nameorbs)
00281 {
00282  ifstream in(nameorbs); // read in from the average file
00283  if (!in){
00284      cout << "Error file  nameorbs  containg the orbitals non existant " <<endl;
00285      return 1;
00286  }
00287 
00288  string line;
00289  string number;
00290 
00291  int i,j;
00292 
00293  vector <string> file;
00294  vector <string> nrg;
00295  int n_lin_in_wt = (NBasis-1)/5+2;
00296  int k=0;
00297  i = 0;
00298  //skip the fortran specification line
00299  getline (in, line);
00300  while (in){
00301         getline (in, line);
00302         
00303         if(k  % (n_lin_in_wt) != 0)
00304         {
00305                 while (line.size() > 1 )
00306                 {
00307                         number.assign(line,0,15);
00308     //                    cout << "DBG ONLY!!! " << number << endl;
00309                         file.push_back(number);
00310                         line.erase(0,15);
00311                 }
00312         }
00313         else {
00314             if (i <NBasis){
00315                 evl[i]= parsenrg(line);
00316             }
00317             i++;
00318         }
00319         k++;
00320    }
00321    if (file.size() != NBasis*NBasis ){
00322        throw runtime_error(string("I expect so many basis on this molecule ") + boost::lexical_cast<string>(NBasis*NBasis) +
00323                string(" but i read so many: " ) + boost::lexical_cast<string>(file.size()));
00324    }
00325    for(i=0,j=0,k=0;i<file.size();i++,k++)
00326    {
00327 
00328         file[i].replace(file[i].size()-4,1,1,'e');
00329         sscanf(file[i].c_str(), "%lf" , &psi[j][k]);
00330         if (i%NBasis==NBasis-1){k=-1;j++;}
00331    }
00332    k=0;
00333    file.clear();
00334    return 0;
00335 }

00338 
00339 int orb::read_orb_gamess( const char * nameorbs)
00340 {
00341  ifstream in(nameorbs); // read in from the average file
00342  if (!in){
00343      cout << "Error file" << nameorbs << "  containg the orbitals non existant " <<endl;
00344      return 1;
00345  }
00346  string word;
00347  while( in ){
00348      in >> word;
00349      if ( word == "vectors" ){
00350         getline(in, word); //skip the rest of the line
00351         int i=0;
00352         int j=0;
00353         while ( i< NBasis){
00354             in >>word;
00355             sscanf(word.c_str(), "%lf", &psi[i][j]);
00356             j++;
00357             if(j==NBasis) {
00358                 j=0;
00359                 i++;
00360             }
00361         }
00362       }
00363    } 
00364  return 0;
00365 }

00367 
00368 void orb::print_g03(string & name, string  mode){
00369         FILE *out = fopen( name.c_str(), mode.c_str()); 
00370         fprintf(out, "(5E15.8)\n");
00371         int count=1;
00372         for (int i=0;i < NBasis;i++){
00373                 fprintf(out, "\t%d Alpha\n", count);
00374                 ++count;
00375                 for (int j=0; j< NBasis ; j++ ){
00376                         fprintf(out, "% 15.8E", psi[i][j]);
00377                         if ((j+1)%5==0 || j==NBasis-1) fprintf(out,"\n");
00378                 }
00379         }
00380         fprintf(out, "\n");
00381         fclose(out);
00382 }
00383 
00384 void orb:: print_uhf_g03( const int & nel_A, const int & nel_B, const int & NBasis_A , const int NBasis_B) {
00385     //check nel even and NBasis+NBasis  == NBasis
00386     if ( nel_A % 2 != 0 || nel_B % 2 != 0 || NBasis_A + NBasis_B != NBasis ){
00387         cerr << "ERROR in input to print_uhf_g03" <<endl;
00388     }
00389          
00390    
00391     FILE *out = fopen( "guess_card.g03", "w");  
00392     fprintf(out, "(1E15.8)\n");
00393 
00394     int count = 1;
00395 
00396     /* first the doubly occupied orbitals on A */
00397     for(int i = 0; i< nel_A/2-2 ; ++i) {
00398         fprintf(out, "\t%d Alpha", count);
00399         ++count;
00400         for (int j=0; j< NBasis ; j++ ){
00401                 fprintf(out, "% 15.8E\n", psi[i][j]);
00402         }
00403     }   
00404 
00405     /*then the double occupied orbitals on B */
00406     for (int i=NBasis_A; i < NBasis_A + nel_B/2-2 ; ++i){
00407         fprintf(out, "\t%d Alpha", count);
00408         ++count;
00409         for (int j=0; j< NBasis ; j++ ){
00410                 fprintf(out, "% 15.8E\n", psi[i][j]);
00411         }
00412     }
00413         
00414     /* then the singly occupied HOMO on A */
00415     fprintf(out, "\t%d Alpha", count);
00416     ++count;
00417     for (int j=0; j< NBasis ; j++ ){
00418         fprintf(out, "% 15.8E\n", psi[nel_A/2 -1][j]);
00419     }
00420 
00421     /* now the LUMOs of A */
00422     for(int i = nel_A; i< NBasis_A ; ++i) {
00423         fprintf(out, "\t%d Alpha", count);
00424         ++count;
00425         for (int j=0; j< NBasis ; j++ ){
00426                 fprintf(out, "% 15.8E\n", psi[i][j]);
00427         }
00428     }   
00429     /* and yes, the LUMOs of B*/
00430     for (int i=NBasis_A+nel_B; i < NBasis ; ++i){
00431         fprintf(out, "\t%d Alpha", count);
00432         ++count;
00433         for (int j=0; j< NBasis ; j++ ){
00434                 fprintf(out, "% 15.8E\n", psi[i][j]);
00435         }
00436     }
00437 
00438     fprintf(out,"\t0\n");
00439 
00440     /* and now the same thing but for the Beta electrons */
00441         
00442     /* first the doubly occupied orbitals on A */
00443     for(int i = 0; i< nel_A/2-2 ; ++i) {
00444         fprintf(out, "\t%d Beta", count);
00445         ++count;
00446         for (int j=0; j< NBasis ; j++ ){
00447                 fprintf(out, "% 15.8E\n", psi[i][j]);
00448         }
00449     }   
00450 
00451     /*then the double occupied orbitals on B */
00452     for (int i=NBasis_A; i < NBasis_A + nel_B/2-2 ; ++i){
00453         fprintf(out, "\t%d Beta", count);
00454         ++count;
00455         for (int j=0; j< NBasis ; j++ ){
00456                 fprintf(out, "% 15.8E\n", psi[i][j]);
00457         }
00458     }
00459         
00460     /* then the singly occupied HOMO on B */
00461     fprintf(out, "\t%d Beta", count);
00462     ++count;
00463     for (int j=0; j< NBasis ; j++ ){
00464         fprintf(out, "% 15.8E\n", psi[NBasis_A + nel_B - 1][j]);
00465     }
00466 
00467     /* now the LUMOs of A */
00468     for(int i = nel_A; i< NBasis_A ; ++i) {
00469         fprintf(out, "\t%d Beta", count);
00470         ++count;
00471         for (int j=0; j< NBasis ; j++ ){
00472                 fprintf(out, "% 15.8E\n", psi[i][j]);
00473         }
00474     }   
00475     /* and yes, the LUMOs of B*/
00476     for (int i=NBasis_A+nel_B; i < NBasis ; ++i){
00477         fprintf(out, "\t%d Beta", count);
00478         ++count;
00479         for (int j=0; j< NBasis ; j++ ){
00480                 fprintf(out, "% 15.8E\n", psi[i][j]);
00481         }
00482     }
00483 
00484 
00485 }

00489 
00490 void orb::dimerise_orbs(const orb & A, const orb & B, const int &elA, const int &elB) {
00491     if ( psi != 0) {
00492         clear();
00493     }
00494     NBasis = A.NBasis + B.NBasis;
00495 
00496     /* set up the arrays */
00497     bs.resize(NBasis);
00498     evl.resize(NBasis);
00499 
00500     if(NBasis==0)
00501         psi=NULL;
00502     else {
00503         psi = new double* [NBasis];
00504         psi[0] = new double [NBasis * NBasis];
00505     }
00506     for ( int i = 1 ; i < NBasis ; i ++){
00507             psi[i] = psi[i-1] + NBasis;
00508     }
00509 
00510     /* cp bs info */
00511     for (int i=0; i< A.NBasis ;++i ){
00512         bs[i] = A.bs[i];
00513         evl[i] =0.;
00514     }
00515     for (int i=0; i< B.NBasis ;++i ){
00516         bs[A.NBasis + i ] = B.bs[i];
00517         evl[A.NBasis + i ]=0.;
00518     }
00519 
00520     /* copy occupied orbitals*/
00521     int occA = (elA)/2;
00522     int occB = (elB)/2;
00523     
00524     /*copy orbitals  from A*/
00525     for (int i=0; i <occA;++i){
00526         for (int j=0 ; j< A.NBasis ;++j){
00527             psi[i][j] = A.psi[i][j];
00528         }
00529         for (int j=0; j< B.NBasis ;++j){
00530             psi[i][A.NBasis+j] =0.0;
00531         }
00532     }
00533 
00534     /*copy orbitals from B*/
00535     for (int i=0; i <occB ;++i){
00536         for (int j=0; j< A.NBasis ;++j){
00537             psi[occA+i][j] = 0.0;
00538         }
00539         for (int j=0; j< B.NBasis ;++j){
00540             psi[occA+i][A.NBasis+j] = B.psi[i][j];
00541         }
00542     }
00543 
00544     /*now copy the empty ones*/
00545 
00546     /*copy orbitals  from A*/
00547     for (int i=occA; i <A.NBasis;++i){
00548         for (int j=0 ; j< A.NBasis ;++j){
00549             psi[occB+i][j] = A.psi[i][j];
00550         }
00551         for (int j=0; j< B.NBasis ;++j){
00552             psi[occB+i][A.NBasis+j] =0.0;
00553         }
00554     }
00555 
00556     /*copy orbitals from B*/
00557     for (int i=occB; i <B.NBasis ;++i){
00558         for (int j=0; j< A.NBasis ;++j){
00559             psi[A.NBasis+i][j] = 0.0;
00560         }
00561         for (int j=0; j< B.NBasis ;++j){
00562             psi[A.NBasis+i][A.NBasis+j] = B.psi[i][j];
00563         }
00564     }
00565 
00566 }
00567 
00568 double orb::parsenrg(string & line){
00569     size_t find = line.find_last_of("=");
00570     if (find >= line.length() ){
00571         return 0.;
00572     }
00573     string found = line.substr(find+1, line.length() - find);
00574     double r;
00575     found.replace(found.size()-4,1,1,'e');
00576     sscanf(found.c_str(), "%lf" , &r);
00577 
00578     return r;
00579 }

00581 }}
